p.k: Izzy misses her mum, so Maggie takes her out for the day to cheer her up. Meanwhile, Shane offers to do Maggie's chores on the farm - but he soon finds that it's not that easy. It's only when Sam and Mama Polenta help that he can finally return to the restaurant to cook Izzy's favourite meal, stuffed red peppers. It reminds her of her mother.
